EmailTemplate.name: 202003_Customer_Connect_Newsletter.March 2020 Customer Connect Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: Your March issue of Customer Connect is here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Resources at your fingertips: Technical Knowledge Center
The Technical Knowledge Center feature lets you find answers to technical questions and view your organization's reported technical issues, anytime of the day or night. Our extensive library contains questions and answers on a wide range of relevant topics.
Learn More >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/redirects/sso/technical-knowledge-center?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Onsite with a Field Service Engineer: Larry Iseman
“When on-site, my goal is to be present for the customer, in addition to building strong relationships. It’s nice being able to travel and getting to know our customer's teams - while also being able to familiarize yourself with their hangar.” Read more about how Larry interacts with his customers in Phoenix, Arizona.
Read More >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> RESOURCE OF THE MONTH Channel Partner Locator <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us/channel-partner-locator?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Use this locator to find the closest Honeywell authorized channel partner to you. <[[https://aerospace2.honeywell.com/wps/myportal/tech-pubs]]> IMPORTANT
LINKS

Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
LET'S
CONNECT
Sign up to receive exclusive communications about offerings, events, news, surveys, special offers and related topics via telephone, email and other forms of electronic communication.
SIGN UP >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/services-and-support/support-center/technical-support?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
